verses.roman:
yāvat kāla darśana karena garuḍera pāche
prabhura āge darśana kare loka lākhe lākhe

synonyms: yāvat kāla—as long as; darśana—seeing; karena—performs; garuḍera pāche—from the back of the Garuḍa column; prabhura āge—in front of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; darśana kare—see; loka—people; lākhe lākhe—in hundreds of thousands.
translation: As He viewed Lord Jagannātha from behind the Garuḍa column, hundreds and thousands of people in front of Him were seeing the Deity.
